comment._content: This looks to be right at the bottom of the steps leading up to the Amalfi Duomo.

comment._content: Thanks! It looks like you could be right. This image of the Amalfi Duomo seems to shows similar stairs: www.flickr.com/photos/sandorl/217300212/ . We can add the information to our source data and reload the description.
